name: DiceMania
description:
Roll the Dice for a weapon, next kill all the enemy Poker Chips in the level, good luck!

WASD to Move

Left Click to Shoot

Mouse to Aim

Small game made by me and my dad for the GMTK game jam

thanks for checking out our game! This was me (and by extention) and my dads first ever game jam. Hope you enjoyed it!

Art - Me (WinterWinter)

Programming - Me & my dad (CallMeBilly68)

Sound/Music - freesound.org :)
